mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM Product_Criteria WHERE flag=0
SELECT count(*) FROM Product_Criteria WHERE Product_no = #{Product_no}
SELECT count(*) FROM Product_Criteria WHERE Product_name = #{Product_name}
mapper.sql: Product_no, Product_name, Product_type, Ingredient_List, Manufacture_duration, Guarantee_period, Unit_Price
mapper.select: select * from Product_Criteria where flag=0 and Product_no like '%${Product_no}%' and Product_name like '%${Product_name}%' and Product_type like '%${Product_type}%'

select
distinct
from Product_Criteria where flag=0
order by ${orderByClause}
select * from Product_Criteria where flag=0 order by Product_no asc
select Product_no from Product_Criteria order by Product_no desc limit 1
select * from Product_Criteria where Product_name = #{Product_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and flag=0
select count(*) from Product_Criteria where flag=0

select
from Product_Criteria where Product_no = #{Product_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and flag=0
mapper.insert: insert into Product_Criteria (Product_no, Product_name, Product_type, Ingredient_List, Manufacture_duration, Guarantee_period, Unit_Price) values (#{Product_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Product_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Product_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Ingredient_List,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Manufacture_duration,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Guarantee_period,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Unit_Price,jdbcType=BIGINT})

insert into Product_Criteria
Product_no,
Product_name,
Product_type,
Ingredient_List,
Manufacture_duration,
Guarantee_period,
Unit_Price,

update Product_Criteria
Product_no = #{record.Product_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Product_name = #{record.Product_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Product_type = #{record.Product_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Ingredient_List = #{record.Ingredient_List,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Manufacture_duration = #{record.Manufacture_duration,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Guarantee_period = #{record.Guarantee_period,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Unit_Price = #{record.Unit_Price,jdbcType=BIGINT},

update Product_Criteria set Product_no = #{record.Product_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Product_name = #{record.Product_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Product_type = #{record.Product_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Ingredient_List = #{record.Ingredient_List,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Manufacture_duration = #{record.Manufacture_duration,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Guarantee_period = #{record.Guarantee_period,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Unit_Price = #{record.Unit_Price,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update Product_Criteria
Product_no = #{Product_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Product_name = #{Product_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Product_type = #{Product_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Ingredient_List = #{Ingredient_List,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Manufacture_duration = #{Manufacture_duration,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Guarantee_period = #{Guarantee_period,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Unit_Price = #{Unit_Price,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where Product_no = #{Product_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update Product_Criteria set Product_no = #{Product_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Product_name = #{Product_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Product_type = #{Product_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Ingredient_List = #{Ingredient_List,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Manufacture_duration = #{Manufacture_duration,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Guarantee_period = #{Guarantee_period,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Unit_Price = #{Unit_Price,jdbcType=BIGINT} where Product_no = #{Product_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
